main_definition: Significant changes or improvements introduced by new ideas, methods, or products that lead to better ways of doing something or solving problems.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Introduction of new and improved products or services
meanings_and_examples.example: The innovations in mobile technology have greatly enhanced the way we communicate.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Implementing novel methods or strategies to solve existing problems or issues
meanings_and_examples.example: Innovations in healthcare have led to more efficient and effective treatment options for patients.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Breaking away from traditional ways of doing things, often resulting in changes across various industries
meanings_and_examples.example: The innovations during the industrial revolution changed manufacturing processes permanently.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Creative use or combination of existing ideas to create something new and valuable
meanings_and_examples.example: His innovation of using recycled materials in designing eco-friendly products has gained widespread attention.
